subject: Restoration and Rehabilitation
Football
lead_paragraph: Cowboys linebacker Greg Ellis says he’s worried he may be forced to retire. He tore his left Achilles’ tendon last November and went through an aggressive rehabilitation to trim a few months off the usual 12-month recovery. But severe pain has not allowed him to practice.
